entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Lévis
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:28 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 17 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy and blowing snow beginning early this evening. Amount 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Blowing snow in the morning. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming light near noon. Wind becoming west 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
